content.raw: I got a Dockerfile building locally and it loads and compiles the code, however, I cannot figure out how to get it to run roscore and then roslaunch the needed files.  It will run roscore as the last command, however, if I try to run a script that does roslaunch after starting roscore, it just says it cannot see the master.  Even if all that works, I don't know how to communicate with the ROS nodes inside the container.  Does the VPN link go to inside the container?
content.html: I got a Dockerfile building locally and it loads and compiles the code, however, I cannot figure out how to get it to run roscore and then roslaunch the needed files. It will run roscore as the last command, however, if I try to run a script that does roslaunch after starting roscore, it just says it cannot see the master. Even if all that works, I don't know how to communicate with the ROS nodes inside the container. Does the VPN link go to inside the container?
